CHAT.comment: GARY BRADFORD CONE, Petitioner v. RICKY BELL, WARDEN.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:08 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF THOMAS C. GOLDSTEIN ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF JENNIFER L. SMITH ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF THOMAS C. GOLDSTEIN ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 12:07 p.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
